Docs.summary: A Class representing an ApiManagementBackend along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct an from an instance of using the GetApiManagementBackendResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetApiManagementBackend method.

Docs.summary: Notifies the APIM proxy to create a new connection to the backend after the specified timeout. If no timeout was specified, timeout of 2 minutes is used. Request Path: /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ApiManagement/service/{serviceName}/backends/{backendId}/reconnect Operation Id: Backend_Reconnect
